text: Living means doing what you love to do
Those who dont remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
Journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Dont wait for the perfect moment.Take the moment and make it perfect.
Newton once said 'I can measure the motion of heavenly bodies but not madness of people.
Dream is not that you sleep, Dream is something that does not let you sleep.
Confidence and hard work is the medicine to kill the disease called Failure.
Be the change you want to see in the world.
Sometime you need to let go of the branch you are hanging. Coz the branch that saved you might kill you.
Choose your poison carefully.
What you seek is seeking you.
The next new real estate is a small place in people mind.
No Guts No Glory No Legend No Story
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
One day or day one. You decide.
Hustle in silence and let your success make the noise.
Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
It’s not the load that breaks you down, It’s the way you carry it.
Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
Dreams don’t work unless you do.
What goes around comes around.
No one is perfect. Our faults define us as much as our success.
When life gives you a hundred reasons to cry, show life that you have a thousand reasons to smile.
Every man is happy until happiness is suddenly a goal.
